value.title: Go serverless: Enterprise integration with Azure Logic Apps | Azure Friday

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to add the Azure Cloud Shell to Visual Studio Code. value.title: How to build a CI/CD pipeline for API Management, Part 2 | Azure Friday
